patthana23.47:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
patthana23.47:1.1_1: dassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.47:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
patthana23.47:2.1_1: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.47:3.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana23.47:3.1_1: sanidassanasappaṭigho nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati
patthana23.47:3.1_2: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
